head.title: Extract images from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} applications
head.description: With {{ProdShortName}}, you can extract images from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} effortlessly, with no need for third-party tools.

header.title: Extract images from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Retrieve embedded images from files such as PDF, Word, Excel, and more using {{ProdShortName}} in your {{EnvNameShort}} development environment.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a feature-rich parsing API tailored for {{EnvName}} developers. It enables the extraction of images, text, links, and structured elements from various file formats including DOCX, XLSX, PDF, PNG, JPG, and many others â€” all without needing external libraries or applications.

formats.title: File types supported for image extraction
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports image extraction across a broad array of documents and images. Explore the commonly supported formats below.

examples.comment_1: Initialize parser and load the document with images using {{textParser}}
examples.comment_2: Collect all image elements embedded in the document
examples.comment_3: Skip processing if the document has no images

steps.title: How to extract images from {{FileformatCap}} in {{ProgLang}}

content.title: Follow these steps to extract images from {{FileFormatUp}} documents using [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) in your {{EnvName}} application:
content.step_1: Create a {{textParser}} instance and load the {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Extract image data from the loaded document.
content.step_3: Use or export the extracted images as needed.

more_features.title: More document parsing capabilities
more_features.description: In addition to image extraction, {{ProdShortName}} allows you to extract raw content like text, links, metadata, and structured data for processing and analysis.
more_features.image_description: Extract images and content from documents

feature_1.title: Works with a variety of formats
feature_1.content: Extract images from different document types including PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, and image formats like PNG, JPEG, and GIF.

feature_2.title: Maintain image clarity and resolution
feature_2.content: All extracted images retain their original resolution and file type to ensure consistent quality and usability.

feature_3.title: Flexible configuration options
feature_3.content: Customize the image extraction process by filtering images by type, size, page index, or file format.

code_1.title: Extract and save images from PDF files
code_1.content: This example shows how to extract images from a PDF document and save them individually on your device.
code_1.comment_1: Use {{textParser}} to open the PDF file
code_1.comment_2: Get the images from the document content
code_1.comment_3: Set output parameters like format (e.g., JPEG or PNG)
code_1.comment_4: Save extracted images to a local directory
